ca.mcgill.ecse211.model

Class UltrasonicLocalizer

  • java.lang.Object
    • ca.mcgill.ecse211.model.UltrasonicLocalizer

  • public class UltrasonicLocalizer
extends java.lang.Object
    This class handles the ultrasonic localization of the robot.
    Author:
    Carlo D'Angelo

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private static double CRITICAL_DISTANCE
      As the robot spins, the ultrasonic sensor detects this distance (cm) twice and, based on the odometer's recorded angles at those instances, calculations are made to make the robot face North (i.e., 0 degrees).
      private EV3LargeRegulatedMotor leftMotor 
      private static double NOISE_MARGIN
      Threshold (+/-: cm) for the CRITICAL_DISTANCE field.
      private Odometer odo 
      private double RADIUS 
      private EV3LargeRegulatedMotor rightMotor 
      private static int ROTATION_SPEED
      Rotation speed (in degrees/second) of the robot during the ultrasonic localization.
      private double TRACK 
      private static double TURN_ERROR 
      private float[] usData 
      private SampleProvider usDistance

      This is the default constructor of this class.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void fallingEdge()
      Method that allows the robot to perform falling edge localization.
      private int readUSDistance()
      Method that fetches data from the ultrasonic sensor.

      • UltrasonicLocalizer

        public UltrasonicLocalizer(EV3LargeRegulatedMotor leftMotor,
                           EV3LargeRegulatedMotor rightMotor,
                           SampleProvider usDistance,
                           float[] usData)
                    throws OdometerExceptions
        This is the default constructor of this class.
        Parameters:
        leftMotor - left motor of robot
        rightMotor - right motor of robot
        usDistance - sample provider from which to fetch ultrasonic sensor data
        usData - array in which to store the ultrasonic sensor data
        Throws:
        OdometerExceptions
